title: Sundar Pichai - Wikipedia
snippet: Pichai Sundararajan (born June 10, 1972), better known as Sundar Pichai (pronounced: /ˈsʊndɜːr pɪˈtʃeɪ/), is an Indian-American business executive. He is the chief executive officer (CEO) of Alphabet Inc. and its subsidiary Google. Pichai began his career as a materials engineer.

title: After criticism over his pay, here's what Google CEO Sundar Pichai earned in 2024
snippet: A standout aspect of Sundar Pichai's compensation package was the substantial cost of his personal security. Alphabet allocated an eye-watering $8.27 million (₹69 crore) towards safeguarding Pichai, marking a 22% increase compared to the previous ...

title: Sundar Pichai: CEO of Alphabet and Google
snippet: Sundar Pichai is an Indian-born American executive who has served as the CEO of Google since 2015 and later as the CEO of its parent company, Alphabet, starting in 2019. Growing up in Chennai, Pichai and his brother shared a sleeping space in ...
